title: Godfather

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
> Attack a player tonight. Nothing more, nothing less.
>
> Alter a player's soul, turning them into a completely different role with an even post number. This role can be **anything** in GIM. This could be a double-edged sword, so beware.
>
> Summon the gang of mafia on a player, permanently removing them from day chats and hangings.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> You can use **any** of these abilities, but only one is available at night. Similar to Potion Master, you must wait two days before using them again.
>
> Your action always succeeds, unless you're roleblocked.
>
> Whenever you're attacked, you will summon your Mafia gang to seek revenge.

desc:
Post 1830
*Anything can change at a whim. Those who can adapt and harness the change will succeed above all else.*
